shortdesc.ph: Enables the reporting of users' volume indication.

section.p: This method enables the SDK to regularly report the volume information of the local user who sends a stream and remote users (up to three) whose instantaneous volumes are the highest to the app. 启用该方法后，只要频道内有发流用户， SDK 会在加入频道后按设置的时间间隔触发 回调。
section.note: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd:
指定音量提示的时间间隔：
≤ 0: 禁用音量提示功能。
>Time interval (ms) between two consecutive volume indications. We recommend a setting greater than 200 ms. 最小不得少于 10 毫秒，否则会收不到 回调。
平滑系数，指定音量提示的灵敏度。 取值范围为 [0,10]，建议值为 3。 The greater the value, the more sensitive the indicator. The recommended value is 3.

ul.li: true: Enable the voice activity detection of the local user. 开启后， 回调的 vad 参数会报告是否在本地检测到人声。
false: (Default) Disable the voice activity detection of the local user. 除引擎自动进行本地人声检测的场景外， 回调的 vad 参数不会报告是否在本地检测到人声。
